message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit higher than I was hoping to pay. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it, which is the price I can get it for from another seller.
I understand your concern, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $130, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $140.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $140. I'm willing to pay $132 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $138.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $138 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $134 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $136.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with $136. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product, and that's my final offer.
